stitionai /

      devika---Devika is an Agentic AI Software Engineer that can understand high-level human instructions, break them down into steps, research relevant information, and write code to achieve the given objective. Devika aims to be a competitive open-source alternative to Devin by Cognition AI.

OpenInterpreter /

      open-interpreter---A natural language interface for computers

suyu-emu /

      suyu---suyu is the continuation of the world's most popular, open-source, Nintendo Switch emulator, yuzu. It is written in C++ with portability in mind, and we're actively working on builds for Windows, Linux and Android.

lobehub /

      lobe-chat---🤯 Lobe Chat - an open-source, modern-design LLMs/AI chat framework. Supports Multi AI Providers( OpenAI / Claude 3 / Gemini / Perplexity / Bedrock / Azure / Mistral / Ollama ), Multi-Modals (Vision/TTS) and plugin system. One-click FREE deployment of your private ChatGPT chat application.

face-hh /

      griddycode---A code editor made with Godot. Code has never been more lit!

Project-DARC /

      DARC---Decentralized Autonomous Regulated Company (DARC), a company virtual machine that runs on any EVM-compatible blockchain, with on-chain law system, multi-level tokens and dividends mechanism.

ubicloud /

      ubicloud---Open, free, and portable cloud. Elastic compute, block storage (non replicated), virtual networking, managed Postgres, and IAM services in public beta.

placeholderkv /

      placeholderkv---A new project to resume development on the formerly open-source Redis project. Name is placeholder.

rasbt /

      LLMs-from-scratch---Implementing a ChatGPT-like LLM from scratch, step by step

jesseduffield /

      lazygit---simple terminal UI for git commands

linkwarden /

      linkwarden---⚡️⚡️⚡️Self-hosted collaborative bookmark manager to collect, organize, and preserve webpages and articles.

OpenDevin /

      OpenDevin---🐚 OpenDevin: Code Less, Make More

StevenBlack /

      hosts---🔒 Consolidating and extending hosts files from several well-curated sources. Optionally pick extensions for porn, social media, and other categories.

lichao-sun /

      Mora---Mora: More like Sora for Generalist Video Generation

SakanaAI /

      evolutionary-model-merge---Official repository of Evolutionary Optimization of Model Merging Recipes

CleverRaven /

      Cataclysm-DDA---Cataclysm - Dark Days Ahead. A turn-based survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world.

jasonppy /

      VoiceCraft---Zero-Shot Speech Editing and Text-to-Speech in the Wild

      dots-hyprland---Modern, feature-rich and accessible desktop configuration.
